title: Business Proposal
overview: In disguise as her friend, Ha-ri shows up to a blind date to scare him away. But plans go awry when he turns out to be her CEO — and makes a proposal.

tv.episodeTitle: Thank you for taking me in like this
tv.episodeOverview: Kang Da-goo's suspicions about his grandson's love life are proven true. On a rainy night after work, Ha-ri takes Tae-moo out on a date.
